name: places/ChIJYS5Vm8pZwokR8vSNXY9S_wE
formattedAddress: 11 Riverside Dr, New York, NY 10023, USA
adrFormatAddress: 11 Riverside Dr, New York, NY 10023, USA

originalText.text:
Selling and buying a house could be very stressful at the hands of unexperienced realtors or it could be the most rewarding experience at the highly talented hands of Sandy Shepherd.

I listed my townhouse with my friend who has also real estate license. The intracoastal townhouse in Florida stayed full year in the market with her. She couldn’t sell the house. It was so frustrating then Covid19 days started.

I contacted Sandy Shepherd at the most difficult times. The value of the house was going down because it stayed in the market for so long. Sandy marketed the house so well. Within first week, we started showing the house again. Her whole team was very supportive, they even went over my insurance options to lower my expenses because the house was empty.

Sandy managed to sell the house within 3 months during pandemic. Everything was handled so professionally, and it turned out to be the best team experience. She and her team walked me out from the deal with a biggest smile on my face.

Previously I had many other real estate transactions with Sandy. Every time she proves that she is the best in the South Florida real estate market.

Lessons learned: Only work with professionals who know the market. Sandy is the one.

originalText.text: I have worked with several agents on this team and all of them have handled their real estate transactions with the utmost attention to detail and professionalism. I would highly recommend them to anyone looking to buy or sell real estate.

originalText.text: Tabatha and the team were excellent we we’re relocating 3000 miles away Tabatha went out of her way to show us multiple properties they really treated us like family she went above and beyond not just in showing us properties but areas  and vendors that we would need once we relocated and found us the perfect house we couldn’t be more happy her and the team did an excellent job I recommend them highly
